Name: Drama
Description: The capital of Drama, known for its historical sites, scenic beauty, and proximity to mountain ranges.

Name: Kavala
Description: A coastal town near Drama, known for its rich cultural heritage and beautiful beaches.

Name: Paranesti
Description: A municipality known for its mountainous terrain and natural beauty, perfect for outdoor activities.

Name: Nea Zichni
Description: A town known for its peaceful atmosphere and rich agricultural land.

Name: Angilion
Description: A rural municipality located in the western part of Drama, famous for its traditional culture.

Name: Vistonida
Description: A municipality known for its natural landscapes, including lakes and mountainous areas.
